data.title: Ghana's Independence: The Ga Contribution
data.meta_description: Bringing all generations of Ga people in North America together in one big ga dangme community
data.text:
Your contribution will enable us to support our employees and continue operations. We are very grateful for your generosity.

GaDangme International (U.S.A. & Canada) is a group who are made up of indigenes of the greater accra region of Ghana (the capital of Ghana). they are of the GaDangme tribe and are always trying their best to bring out the best from their people. A few months ago, they organised

AyI Wa Soo is the name of the capital of the ancient Ga kingdom of Accra. Watch this documentary to know more about this kingdom.

There's a wrong Homowo calendar which is circulating on social media. Elders of lantey Dzan We who are in charge of the calculation of the traditional months for the Ga state have come out to explain why it is fake.

GaDangme International, Inc is dedicated to improving the lives of those in need. Our mission is to provide resources and support to underserved communities and individuals.

There are many ways to support GaDangme International, Inc's mission. You can make a donation, become a member, or volunteer your time. Every contribution makes a difference!

From education to healthcare, GaDangme International, Inc offers a variety of programmes to support the community. Learn more about our initiatives and how we make a positive impact.

Join our team of volunteers and make a difference in the lives of others. We have a variety of volunteer opportunities available. Sign up today!

Find out how GaDangme International, Inc has made a difference in the community and the lives of those we serve. We are committed to creating lasting change.

Have a question or want to get in touch? We'd love to hear from you. Contact us today and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
